item.description:
Here's what to expect at our meetup: Our Sunday meetups start at 2:00 (winter schedule) with a few minutes of socializing.  Hot tea (herbal and regular) and water is provided. We sit around a large table.  The first part of each meeting involves several minutes of silent meditation.  We just sit with our eyes open or closed and try to leave of the busy distractions of our lives behind.

A new format for the meetings will be starting in 2012.  A number of us will be doing the 365 daily lessons of the workbook.  We will take the first 30 minutes to discuss any topics of interest related to the lessons for the preceding week.  We will spend the remainder of the group discussing the text.  Some of us will be following a plan to read through the text in 1 year (see link for schedule below) so we will likely be looking at relevant sections, also from the preceding week.

If you want to know what lessons we will be talking about just figure out the day of the year that the meeting falls on (ie., #63).  We will be talking about the 7 lessons prior to that day. Or you can look at the calendar posted at the Circle of Atonement website:

http://www.circleofa.org/study/calendar.php?prm=12&year=2011&chm=1

I can e-mail you a word document with the daily lesson and text for the whole year.

Peace

group.name: Connecticut A Course In Miracles Study Group

item.name: ACIM Discussion Group
